com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.kinesisvideo.util

Class CameraUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.kinesisvideo.util.CameraUtils

  • public class CameraUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to get information about cameras, like supported resolutions, get supported configurations, etc

    • Method Detail

      • getSupportedResolutions

        public static java.util.List<android.util.Size> getSupportedResolutions(android.content.Context context,
                                                                        java.lang.String cameraId)
        Queries the Android camera API for supported resolutions for given camera id. Camera id can be obtained from the KinesisVideoClient by listing the supported media source configurations, or by querying Android directly, e.g. by calling CameraManager, or by using getCameras() in this CameraUtils class

      • getCameras

        public static java.util.List<CameraMediaSourceConfiguration> getCameras(KinesisVideoClient kinesisVideoClient)
        Lists only cameras by getting known media sources known to the KinesisVideoClient

        Tries to find a supported configuration for each camera on the device
